comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

buttons in languages menu in become almost invisible when we delete all languages, close menu, open it again, choose language and click "add"

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. open "options"
2. click "choose" in "languages"
3. delete all languages, which are used for displaying web pages
4. close all menus
5. repeat steps 1-2
6. choose a language
7. click "add"
Actual Results:  
buttons in language menu ("OK", "Cancel" and "Help") are almost invisible (moved under the lower border of the window)

Expected Results:  
all buttons in language menu are present and visible

buttons in languages menu in become almost invisible when we delete all languages, close menu, open it again, choose language and click "add"

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. open "options"
2. click "choose" in "languages"
3. delete all languages, which are used for displaying web pages
4. close all menus
5. repeat steps 1-2
6. choose a language
7. click "add"
Actual Results:  
buttons in language menu ("OK", "Cancel" and "Help") are almost invisible (moved under the lower border of the window)

Expected Results:  
all buttons in language menu are present and visible
